sentences.en: All a sudden, Alice had a gleeful look in her eye.
sentences.cn: 忽然, 爱丽丝眼中闪现出兴奋的眼神.

sentences.en: All of a sudden, Alice had a gleeful look in her eye.
sentences.cn: 突然, 爱丽丝眼中闪现出兴奋的眼神.

sentences.en: He had a naughty schoolboy's gleeful disregard for rules.
sentences.cn: 他有顽皮小学生一样的对于无视规则的欣喜.

sentences.en: He took an almost gleeful delight in showing how wrong they can be.
sentences.cn: 他几乎是幸灾乐祸地指出他们大错特错。

sentences.en: He was well stirred up now; cheerful, even gleeful.
sentences.cn: 这时他激动起来, 神采奕奕, 兴高采烈.

sentences.en: I had not seen my father so gleeful.
sentences.cn: 我从来没见过他这样高兴过.

sentences.en: Mr. Smith was gleeful over the achievement they had made.
sentences.cn: 史密斯先生对他们取得的成就感到万分高兴.

sentences.en: The victory inspired him to dispatch a gleeful telegram to Roosevelt.
sentences.cn: 胜利促使他给罗斯福发了封喜报。

sentences.en: Yet the media show pictures of gleeful farmers buying televisions and fridges.
sentences.cn: 然而媒体登载的照片显示,快活的农民们正在购买电视机和冰箱.

trans.tran_cn: 欣喜的，高兴的，令人愉快的
